select distinct m.*,(select p.name from sys_menu p where p.id = m.parent_id) as parentName from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.order_num asc
